name: Duet to Duat
description:
Duet to Duat

You are rudely awakened in your sarcophagus after a tumultuous nap and realise your existence has not yet left for Duat, the Ancient Egyptian afterlife, instead, your body and spirit are still on earth! Restless and half-dead, you have ventured into the temple that will allow you to cross over to the afterlife, but only if you can prove the righteousness of both your body and spirit through a series of trials.

The game allows 2 players to collaborate their way using their asymmetrical abilities through the levels of an Ancient Egyptian temple. One player plays as a body and one as a spirit, as they both can manipulate their own unique objects to progress the puzzles and help each other. The goal is to reach the end of the temple, prove their worth, and sail off to their afterlife! The game plays best using 2 gamepads. Made in Unity for the GP2 module at Futuregames Stockholm.

Team:

David Kumlin

Amos Johan Persson
